                                    English


When it comes to FPS based on cooperative action one name stands out from the others, Counter-Strike. The game remains a success until the present day, although other evidence to present a more interesting gameplay, graphics or maybe more accurate.

Aware of this popularity developers from Turtle Rock, decided to make the game more interesting, rather than terrorist police, so that survivors against endless hordes of zombies. And thus was born Left 4 Dead. The game became an instant success and since then became a reference point with respect to the rampant slaughter of the undead.

If the idea worked once why can not it work again? For this was the thinking of the developers of Tripwire Interactive, which decided to bring his vision of an apocalyptic zombie invasion.


Minimum Requirements
Processor: Pentium IV 1.2 GHz or equivalent Athlon
Processor speed: 1.2 GHz
RAM: 512 MB
Video Memory: 64 MB
Direct3D: Yes
DirectX version: 9.0c
Operating Systems: Windows XP, Windows Vista
Space: 2 GB free disk


Recommended Requirements
RAM: 1 GB
Video Memory: 128 MB
Direct3D: Yes
DirectX version: 9.0c
Operating Systems: Windows ME, Windows Vista
Space: 2 GB free disk
